name: PO List
query:
SELECT
	`oi`.`order_date` AS `PO DATE:Date`,
	`oi`.`department` AS `DEPARTMENT`,
	`oi`.`employee_name` AS `NAM::150E`,
	`oi`.`mr_number` AS "PR NUMBER:Link/Material Request:130",
	`oi`.`order_no` AS "PO NUMBER:Link/Purchase Order:130",
	`oi`.`supplier` AS `SUPPLIER::150`,
	`oi`.`po_status` AS `PO STATUS`,
    `oi`.`item_name` AS "ITEM:160",
	`oi`.`item_group` AS `ITEM GROUP`,
	`oi`.`poi_qty` AS `QTY`,
	`oi`.`poi_uom` AS `UNIT`,
	`oi`.`poi_rate` AS "UNIT PRICE:Currency:80",
	`oi`.`poi_amount` AS `AMOUNT:Currency:80`,
	`recv_inv`.`receipt_date` AS `RECEIPT DATE:Date`,
	`recv_inv`.`receipt_no` AS "RECEIPT NUMBER:Link/Purchase Receipt:130",
	`recv_inv`.`is_return` AS `IS RETURN`,
	`recv_inv`.`recv_qty` AS `RECEIPT QTY:int`,
	`recv_inv`.`recv_uom` AS `RECEIPT UNIT`,
	`recv_inv`.`invoice_date` AS `INVOICE DATE:Date`,
	`recv_inv`.`invoice_no` AS "INVOICE NUMBER:Link/Purchase Invoice:150",
	`recv_inv`.`inv_grandtotal` AS `INVOICE TOTAL:Currency:80`,
	`recv_inv`.`outstanding_amount` AS `OUTSTANDING:Currency:80`,
	`recv_inv`.`invi_qty` AS `INVOICE QTY`,
	`recv_inv`.`invi_uom` AS `INVOICE UNIT`,
	`recv_inv`.`invi_amount` AS `INVOICE  AMOUNT:Currency:80`,
	IF
		(
			`recv_inv`.`outstanding_amount` < `recv_inv`.`inv_grandtotal` and 	`recv_inv`.`outstanding_amount` > 0 ,
			'Partially Paid', `recv_inv`.inv_status ) AS `INVOICE STATUS` 
	
FROM
	(((
			SELECT
				`ord`.`department_name` AS `department`,
				`ord`.`employee_name` AS `employee_name`,
				`ord`.`mr_number` AS `mr_number`,
				`ord`.`status` AS `po_status`,
				`ord`.`supplier_name` AS `supplier`,
				`ord`.`transaction_date` AS `order_date`,
				`ord_i`.`parent` AS `order_no`,
				`ord_i`.`name` AS `order_item`,
				`ord`.`total` AS `po_total`,
				`ord`.`taxes_and_charges_added` AS `po_tax`,
				`ord`.`grand_total` AS `po_grandtotal`,
				`ord`.`per_received` / 100 AS `per_received`,
				`ord`.`per_billed` / 100 AS `per_billed`,
				`ord_i`.`item_code` AS `item_code`,
				`ord_i`.`item_name` AS `item_name`,
				`ord_i`.`item_group` AS `item_group`,
				`ord_i`.`qty` AS `poi_qty`,
				`ord_i`.`uom` AS `poi_uom`,
				`ord_i`.`rate` AS `poi_rate`,
				`ord_i`.`amount` AS `poi_amount` 
			FROM
				(`tabPurchase Order Item` `ord_i`
				JOIN `tabPurchase Order` `ord` ON ( `ord_i`.`parent` = `ord`.`name` )) 
			WHERE
				`ord_i`.`docstatus` = 1 
				)) `oi`
		LEFT JOIN (
		SELECT
		IF
			( `RI`.`order_item` IS NULL, `II`.`order_item`, `RI`.`order_item` ) AS `order_item`,
			`RI`.`receipt_date` AS `receipt_date`,
			`RI`.`receipt_no` AS `receipt_no`,
			`RI`.`receipt_item` AS `receipt_item`,
			`RI`.`is_return` AS `is_return`,
			`RI`.`recv_qty` AS `recv_qty`,
			`RI`.`recv_uom` AS `recv_uom`,
			`II`.`invoice_date` AS `invoice_date`,
			`II`.`invoice_no` AS `invoice_no`,
			`II`.`invoice_item` AS `invoice_item`,
			`II`.`inv_total` AS `inv_total`,
			`II`.`inv_tax` AS `inv_tax`,
			`II`.`inv_grandtotal` AS `inv_grandtotal`,
			`II`.`outstanding_amount` AS `outstanding_amount`,
			`II`.`inv_status` AS `inv_status`,
			`II`.`invi_qty` AS `invi_qty`,
			`II`.`invi_uom` AS `invi_uom`,
			`II`.`invi_amount` AS `invi_amount` 
		FROM
			(((
					SELECT
						`ii`.`po_detail` AS `order_item`,
						`i`.`posting_date` AS `invoice_date`,
						`ii`.`parent` AS `invoice_no`,
						`ii`.`name` AS `invoice_item`,
						`i`.`total` AS `inv_total`,
						`i`.`taxes_and_charges_added` AS `inv_tax`,
						`i`.`grand_total` AS `inv_grandtotal`,
						`i`.`status` AS `inv_status`,
						`i`.`outstanding_amount` AS `outstanding_amount`,
						`ii`.`qty` AS `invi_qty`,
						`ii`.`uom` AS `invi_uom`,
						`ii`.`amount` AS `invi_amount`,
						`i`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by`,
						`i`.`is_return` AS `is_return`,
						`ii`.`purchase_receipt` AS `purchase_receipt` 
					FROM
						(
						`tabPurchase Invoice Item` `ii`
						JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` `i` ON ( `ii`.`parent` = `i`.`name` )) 
					WHERE
						`ii`.`docstatus` = 1 
						)) `II`
				LEFT JOIN (
				SELECT
					`ri`.`purchase_order_item` AS `order_item`,
					`r`.`posting_date` AS `receipt_date`,
					`ri`.`parent` AS `receipt_no`,
					`ri`.`name` AS `receipt_item`,
					`r`.`is_return` AS `is_return`,
					`ri`.`qty` AS `recv_qty`,
					`ri`.`uom` AS `recv_uom` 
				FROM
					(`tabPurchase Receipt Item` `ri`
					JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` `r` ON ( `ri`.`parent` = `r`.`name` )) 
				WHERE
					`r`.`docstatus` = 1 
				) `RI` ON ( `II`.`order_item` = `RI`.`order_item` AND `II`.`purchase_receipt` = `RI`.`receipt_no` )) UNION
		SELECT
		IF
			( `RI`.`order_item` IS NULL, `II`.`order_item`, `RI`.`order_item` ) AS `order_item`,
			`RI`.`receipt_date` AS `receipt_date`,
			`RI`.`receipt_no` AS `receipt_no`,
			`RI`.`receipt_item` AS `receipt_item`,
			`RI`.`is_return` AS `is_return`,
			`RI`.`recv_qty` AS `recv_qty`,
			`RI`.`recv_uom` AS `recv_uom`,
			`II`.`invoice_date` AS `invoice_date`,
			`II`.`invoice_no` AS `invoice_no`,
			`II`.`invoice_item` AS `invoice_item`,
			`II`.`inv_total` AS `inv_total`,
			`II`.`inv_tax` AS `inv_tax`,
			`II`.`inv_grandtotal` AS `inv_grandtotal`,
			`II`.`outstanding_amount` AS `outstanding_amount`,
			`II`.`inv_status` AS `inv_status`,
			`II`.`invi_qty` AS `invi_qty`,
			`II`.`invi_uom` AS `invi_uom`,
			`II`.`invi_amount` AS `invi_amount` 
		FROM
			(((
					SELECT
						`ri`.`purchase_order_item` AS `order_item`,
						`r`.`posting_date` AS `receipt_date`,
						`ri`.`parent` AS `receipt_no`,
						`ri`.`name` AS `receipt_item`,
						`r`.`is_return` AS `is_return`,
						`ri`.`qty` AS `recv_qty`,
						`ri`.`uom` AS `recv_uom` 
					FROM
						(`tabPurchase Receipt Item` `ri`
						JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` `r` ON ( `ri`.`parent` = `r`.`name` )) 
					WHERE
						`r`.`docstatus` = 1 
						)) `RI`
				LEFT JOIN (
				SELECT
					`ii`.`po_detail` AS `order_item`,
					`i`.`posting_date` AS `invoice_date`,
					`ii`.`parent` AS `invoice_no`,
					`ii`.`name` AS `invoice_item`,
					`i`.`total` AS `inv_total`,
					`i`.`taxes_and_charges_added` AS `inv_tax`,
					`i`.`grand_total` AS `inv_grandtotal`,
					`i`.`status` AS `inv_status`,
					`i`.`outstanding_amount` AS `outstanding_amount`,
					`ii`.`qty` AS `invi_qty`,
					`ii`.`uom` AS `invi_uom`,
					`ii`.`amount` AS `invi_amount`,
					`i`.`modified_by` AS `modified_by`,
					`i`.`is_return` AS `is_return`,
					`ii`.`purchase_receipt` AS `purchase_receipt` 
				FROM
					(
						`tabPurchase Invoice Item` `ii`
					JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` `i` ON ( `ii`.`parent` = `i`.`name` )) 
				WHERE
					`ii`.`docstatus` = 1 
				) `II` ON ( `II`.`order_item` = `RI`.`order_item` AND `II`.`purchase_receipt` = `RI`.`receipt_no` ))) `recv_inv` ON ( `oi`.`order_item` = `recv_inv`.`order_item` )) 
ORDER BY
	`oi`.`order_date`,
	`oi`.`supplier`
